events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but I want to request a refund because the size I received is completely wrong and I cannot use it.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to receiving an incorrect size item.
An agent specializing in refund cases has been assigned to assist with this request.
Hello! I’m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket you received in the wrong size.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the jacket showing the incorrect size label?
Here is my order number 12345 and attached is the photo clearly showing the tag says size M but I ordered L.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund for you and provide a return shipping label at no cost.
Thank you for the quick response and the refund offer. I appreciate your help resolving this so smoothly.
Your refund has been initiated and you will receive an email with the return label shortly.
We’re just checking in to confirm that you received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist with.
Yes, I received the refund today. Everything was handled perfectly. Thank you again!
We are closing this case now. Please don’t hesitate to contact us if you need further assistance in the future.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to gather your feedback on this support experience.
